content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL, warning “out of fuel”, with furnace_source holding 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS, fuel inventory (2 coal) and furnace_result containing 6 copper plates.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) performing research "automation" with lab_input {'automation-science-pack': 10}; status: NO_POWER, electrical_id updated to 12168.
- ElectricityGroup with id=12168 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5), and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Generator (steam engine) at position(2.5, 21.5) with connection_points [(5.0, 21.5), (0.0, 21.5)], neighbours including pipes at positions (3.5, 23.5), (4.5, 23.5), and (2.5, 24.5); warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; status: NOT_CONNECTED.
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding approximately 200 units of water at 15°C; status: NO_FUEL, warnings: ["out of fuel"], connection_points [(-5.5, 22.5), (-5.5, 26.5)], steam_output at (-7.5, 24.5), and fluid_systems [45516].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) with a fluid_box holding approximately 100 units of water at 15°C; status: WORKING, connection point (-9.5, 23.5), and fluid_systems [45516].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=45516 at position(-6.5, 20.5) – status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=45517 at position(-2.5, 20.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=45518 at position(-0.5, 21.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=45523 at position(-3.5, 23.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=45522 at position(-7.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=45527 at position(3.5, 25.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=45526 at position(2.5, 24.5) – status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=45529 at position(-0.5, 28.5) – status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────────────
- Pipeline Connection Failures with Incorrect Fluid System Identifiers:
   • Multiple attempts using fluid_system values [45172, 45215, 45258, 45301, 45344, 45387, 45430, 45473] resulted in no working PipeGroup.
   • Tip: Dynamically retrieve and validate the active fluid_system identifier from the current network configuration before initiating a pipeline connection.
- Hardcoded Fluid System Assumptions:
   • Reliance on preset fluid_system values without runtime validation has repeatedly caused aborted connection attempts.
   • Tip: Validate the network’s fluid configuration dynamically prior to connecting.
- Fuel Supply Oversight:
   • The boiler remains unfueled, hindering proper steam generation.
   • Tip: Replenish the boiler’s fuel inventory promptly to ensure continuous operation.
